title: FS. T206s with stamp on the back
author: Joem36

posts.post_title: FS. T206s with stamp on the back
posts.post_content:
I have for sale a few t206s with stamps on the back. I would like payment to be a PayPal gift to [url]lisajoe97@yahoo.com[/url]. 

Donlin with circle stamp $25
Cross with Saturday Evening Post. Stamp (SOLD)
Doyle with star stamp $25 (Hold)
Dubuc with Dunford stamp $25 (Hold)
Freeman with "good" stamp $25
Grimshaw with stamp $25
Isbell with stamp $25
Krause with square stamp $25
McIntyre with stamp $25
Kroh with star stamp $25
Latham with 3 small stars stamp $25
Murphy with Forest Burrows stamp $30

Buy more then two and I will discount the price.

I will also trade for 1948-49 Leaf baseball. I'm looking for poor to fair. Just no paper loss or writing.

Sorry for the small pics. Send me your email and I will send larger pics. Thanks
Joe
